participant_1.background:
My appearance is not my main concern, since I care more about the environment and fighting for its protection.
i watch a movie sundays evenings.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
i have trouble getting motivated.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.

participant_2.background:
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.
my favorite hobby is reading.
I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game.
My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job.
I like to eat healthy and clean, but I also have a sweet tooth for desserts.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to?
Hi there, not much. Just got back from the gym. How about you?
Oh that's cool, I'm trying to get back into a workout routine. I work in the environmental sector so I'm all about taking care of the planet.
Oh nice! That's a really important field. My job is pretty hectic but I love it! I'm a sports nutritionist and help athletes stay healthy and perform their best.
That's so cool! I wish I could eat healthier but I have a real sweet tooth.
Haha yeah I know what you mean. I love sweets too but I try to stay away from them most of the time.
I'm impressed that you can stay away from them. I'm not sure I could do that.
Haha it's not easy but it's worth it!
Oh yeah I'm sure it is. So what do you like to do for fun?
I love reading, spending time with my family, and going to the gym.
Oh nice! I love reading too. I'm trying to get into a book club so I can meet new people and talk about books.
That's a great idea! I love book clubs.
So what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called The Secret Garden. It's a classic and I'm really enjoying it.
Oh nice! I've heard good things about that book.
